name: sweet suzy washcloth
notes:
**this design is a premium pattern: a free version of this pattern is also available on my blog. the paid premium version offers a tidy and neatly formatted .pdf download.**

> you are very welcome to join our
> growing facebook community! share
> project photos and connect with other
> crocheters in a positive and
> encouraging environment. [click
> here][1]

> 
> this pattern is part of the sweet suzy
> collection. explore the other designs
> in this set here: [sweet suzy hand
> towel][2] and [sweet suzy face
> scrubbies][3]

the sweet suzy washcloth uses a simple combination of the suzette stitch and back loop single crochet to create a lovely and textured design. using worsted cotton yarn and a 5mm hook, this pattern works up quickly to approximately 9x9 inches in size.

**inside the pattern you will find:**
- detailed written instructions (written in us terms)
- special stitch tutorials (with direct links for detailed walk throughs)
- clear photos
- required tools, approximate yardage required

**materials needed:**
- approximately 85 yards of worsted cotton yarn (i used bernat handicrafter)
- 5mm crochet hook
- yarn needle, scissors, measuring tape

**this pattern has been tested so you can feel confident in your purchase! please note this is a digital file and not a finished product. there will be no refunds on digital products.**
